meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rebecca McNitt Rob Hornick James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7976.

td.p: Rebecca McNitt, an archivist from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Rob Hornick, a product manager from San Francisco, California
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 12-day cash winnings total $851,926)

tr.td: HAPPY EARTH DAY TO YOU!
THE 20-TEENS
REALITY TV
DOUBLE-LETTER PLACES
JEOPARD"IZED"
THEY PLANNED THEIR OWN FUNERAL
